snippet: Afghan forces claimed to have overrun and destroyed a Pakistani-held border crossing, an event that provoked an outpouring of nationalist sentiment in Afghanistan.
abstract: Afghan forces claim to have overrun and destroyed Pakistani-held border crossing, provoking outpouring of nationalist sentiment in Afghanistan.

byline.contributor: Sangar Rahimi contributed reporting from Kabul; an Afghan employee of The New York Times from Jalalabad, Afghanistan; and Salman Masood from Islamabad, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: Afghan forces claimed to have overrun and destroyed a Pakistani-held border crossing, an event that provoked an outpouring of nationalist sentiment in Afghanistan.

headline.seo: Clash on Pakistan Border Stirs Afghan Emotions
headline.main: A Border Clash Stirs Emotions in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: A Border Clash Stirs Emotions in Afghanistan
